AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Blue Venom swashbuckler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While somewhat skilled with a blade, [PAWN_nameDef] was also somewhat knowledgeable about elemental salts, and made great use of this knowledge during skirmishes.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] is one of the few survivors of the Blue Venom pirates, and is now in hiding, hoping one day to reconnect with the remainders of [PAWN_possessive] crew.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Blue Venom bounty hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had a knack for finding people that didn't want to be found, especially when there was a price on their head. This skill was rather invaluable for the Blue Venom pirates, and made up one of their main sources of income.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] is one of the few survivors of the Blue Venom pirates, and is now in hiding, hoping one day to reconnect with the remainders of [PAWN_possessive] crew.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Blue Venom flame adept
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Somewhat talented with magic, and ever obsessed with the flicker of flame, it was obvious that [PAWN_nameDef] would become a fire mage. This skillset proved rather useful for the Blue Venom pirates, especially if they needed evidence of their activities to disappear.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] is one of the few survivors of the Blue Venom pirates, and is now in hiding, hoping one day to reconnect with the remainders of [PAWN_possessive] crew.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Blue Venom necromancer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Having a necromancer in your crew proved rather useful for the Blue Venom pirates. [PAWN_nameDef] ensured crew members were never truly lost in battle, and turned extended skirmishes into battles of attrition.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] is one of the few survivors of the Blue Venom pirates, and is now in hiding, hoping one day to reconnect with the remainders of [PAWN_possessive] crew.
